abstract: Com to Defend Amer by Aiding Allies: 300th local chap formed, Anniston, Ala; rept on number of petition signatures for aid to Brit
snippet: A preparatory military course, in anticipation of a second Plattsburg training camp for business and professional men, was announced yesterday at the offices of the Military Training Camps Association, 28 West Forty-fourth Street....

headline.main: WAR COURSE READY FOR BUSINESS MEN; Army Training to Prepare for Second Plattsburg Period Is Started by Camp Group MAJOR BOYCE HEADS PLAN Former 'Broomstick Brigade' Commander Arranges Class of Lectures and Drills

lead_paragraph: A preparatory military course, in anticipation of a second Plattsburg training camp for business and professional men, was announced yesterday at the offices of the Military Training Camps Association, 28 West Forty-fourth Street.
